title: Lit Law
description: An AI-powered legal platform built to handle legal queries using Large Language Models (LLMs).
longDescription: Lit Law is a scalable AI-driven web platform tailored for the Indian legal ecosystem. I developed the backend architecture for chat handling, designed an efficient chat schema, and created APIs for session management. The frontend was enhanced using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, with state management through Redux. Code quality and structure were maintained with tools like Husky and Lint-staged.
challenges: Designing a scalable chat-based architecture for legal queries
Integrating AI features while ensuring accuracy and performance
solutions: Integrated LLMs to provide AI-driven responses to legal questions

title: Lit Sign
description: AI Legal Contract Builder and Signer with multi-party collaboration features.
longDescription: Lit Sign is a full-stack platform for AI-assisted legal document creation and digital signing. I developed the Node.js backend handling contract generation, versioning, multi-party signing, and LLM-based clause negotiation. The frontend, built with React and Redux, enables users to manage contracts seamlessly.
challenges: Implementing AI-driven clause negotiation between parties
Handling real-time contract updates with multiple signers
solutions: Built chat-based negotiation system backed by LLMs

title: Legal Wires
description: Migrated 8000+ posts from WordPress to Ghost CMS with a custom-built theme and AI chatbot integration.
longDescription: I migrated Legal Wires, a leading legal news portal, from WordPress to Ghost CMS, handling over 8000 blog posts with zero data loss. Developed a custom Ghost theme using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrated an AI chatbot to assist users in legal queries, greatly boosting user engagement.
solutions: Built custom migration scripts using Ghost API
Developed responsive and SEO-friendly Ghost theme

title: DNS Manager Hub
description: A MERN stack app for efficient domain and DNS record management using AWS Route 53.
longDescription: DNS Manager Hub allows users to manage domains and DNS records with AWS Route 53 easily. Built a user-friendly dashboard for domain operations, including CRUD functionality, filters, search, and bulk uploads. Integrated secure authentication and developed APIs for interacting with AWS services.
challenges: Managing bulk DNS record uploads efficiently
solutions: Built efficient bulk record management with optimized backend queries

title: Four Paws
description: A responsive pet adoption platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to support stray dog adoption across India.
longDescription: Four Paws is a full-stack pet adoption platform designed to facilitate digital adoption for stray dogs. Built a responsive and intuitive UI using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring dynamic profiles for 40+ dogs. Enabled real-time updates to adoption statuses and attracted weekly visitors and corporate sponsors. Integrated a clean, mobile-first design ensuring seamless user experience across devices.
challenges: Building a responsive UI for multiple devices
Handling dynamic content updates in real-time
solutions: Implemented a mobile-first responsive design with Tailwind CSS
Developed efficient APIs for updating adoption statuses dynamically

title: Admin Panel CMS
description: A full-stack CMS platform for multi-user blog management with secure image storage using ImageKit, built with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and Express.js.
longDescription: Admin Panel CMS is a scalable, full-stack content management system designed for multi-user blogging workflows. Engineered a responsive admin dashboard using React and Tailwind CSS to allow users and authors to create, edit, update, and publish blog posts. Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) for multiple users and authors. Developed backend APIs with Node.js and Express.js, integrated ImageKit for efficient media upload and management, and optimized data handling with MongoDB. Ensured seamless and secure communication between frontend and backend via JWT authentication and RESTful API design.
challenges: Implementing scalable role-based access control for users and authors
Ensuring secure and optimized image upload and storage using ImageKit
Maintaining synchronization between frontend state and backend database operations
solutions: Developed a robust RBAC system with JWT and middleware-based route protection
Integrated ImageKit SDKs for secure, scalable media uploads and retrieval
Built efficient RESTful APIs and optimized state management on the client side using React Context and custom hooks
